Posts.Content: Thats good, hugs are needed today feeling very down today. Hope you are ok  Hugs back  Aimee x
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: Im er+ and her- so will have tamoxifen after, im trying so hard to be positive i suppose we all have days like that. Its nice to talk to someone at the same stage of treatment, im sure it will get easier after the first round. Ive struggled most with being told after mri all clear then to a little in my node, it worries me the most. Its good that you are out i plan to do the same with my two little girls  Aimee x

Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, having a bad day today! Had my 2nd lumpectomy for unclear margins as they found dcis around th idc lump i had! And one node tested positive, but i will have radio on this area and no need for clearance. I get my results a week on thursday and trying not to let me mind run, but finding it very hard as scans didnt show the dcis or any lumphnodes involved!  Any advice is welcome. Aimee x
